name: Word Press Currency Exchange
author: Niel Hendrich

sections.description:
Widget that lets you to make currency covertions in your blog.
The reference rates below obtained from the European Central Bank
and are based on the regular daily concertation procedure between central
banks within and outside the European System of Central Bank
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file and extract the contents.
  2. Upload the ‘wmaps’ folder to your plugins directory (wp-content/plugins/).
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘plugins’ page in WP.
  4. After yo activate the plug, you will see an new option called “My Maps” in the “Settings” menu.

Using the plugin
5. Goto to the “appearance/design” menu and click on “widgets” option.
6. Click on the “add” link to enable the widget on the side bar.
7. Click on the edit link and configure the default amount a the default currency.
